author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

ClusterRemovalRefSetter depends on FWCore/Framework which is not an allowed dependency for a class in DataFormats.

TrackingTools/PatternTools was chosen based on what packages were already dependencies of the packages using ClusterRemovalRefSetter.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles.
title: Moved ClusterRemovalRefSetter to TrackingTools/PatternTools
